Review Text: Great beer..liked the jasmine versions. Great service, very polite and helpful waiter, Qing, and food was delicious !
Location: Pasteur Street Craft Beer - Original Taproom

Review Text:
Nice and simple place in ventemusikk of Ho Chi Minh. Quite crampy and small, but the beer was great. I had the Meat Lover Combo and a pint og Jasmine Amber Ale.
Nice place to drop in.
Location: Pasteur Street Craft Beer - Original Taproom

Review Text: Great food at a good price was very happy with what we received. Wife had the Crab omelet with garlic fried rice and I had the 2 sausages with onion rings and oyster mushrooms as a side. 10/10 reminded me of good pub food from home.
Location: Pasteur Street Craft Beer - Original Taproom

Review Text:
A great place to enjoy some craft beer and finger food in Vietnam. This is one of the famous breweries in Ho Chi Minh City and have many types of beer. 

Tried and liked the Jasmine IPa and lager beer options. The salads and chicken wings were great addition to the beer.
Location: Pasteur Street Craft Beer - Original Taproom

Review Text:
Open until midnight. 
Friday night, if you get there at 11:20 they don’t sell you a beer because last order is at 11:00. What at bullsit!
Location: Pasteur Street Craft Beer - Original Taproom

Review Text:
This restaurant itself was very bright clean and spacious. The staff were professional, warm and friendly.
The food was excellent and quick service. Excellent Chanh Muoi beer! Must try!
Location: Pasteur Street Craft Beer - Original Taproom

Review Text: Beer and atmosphere were OK. However, the caramelized fish sauce wings were the best wings I've ever had anywhere. Absolutely amazing flavor.
Location: Pasteur Street Craft Beer - Original Taproom

Review Text:
This is a must go to in Saigon. It’s down and alley on Pasteur, up a flight of stairs, and there you are. All of the drafts are unique, full of flavor, and mature. It’s just a fact that the longer you do the same thing, the better you get at it.

Here, on Pasteur street itself, seek out my man Hung. He’s a great guy and knows a lot about beer, and just fun ti be around.

Cheers!
Location: Pasteur Street Craft Beer - Original Taproom

Review Title: ホーチミンのクラフトビール
Review Text: 金曜日の７時に来店。店内とルーフトップがあります。ビール6種類飲み比べがお得です。ホーチミンでしかないものもありますので是非、おすすめします。おつまみも種類が多く、スタッフおすすめのベトナムソーセージがとても美味しかったです。そしてスタッフも皆、フレンドリーです。
Location: Pasteur Street Craft Beer - Original Taproom

Review Title: Fun night out in Ho Chi Minh.
Review Text:
This place is a fabulous find. Great food and choice. Great beer with so much choice and so innovative!
Add friendly staff and you have yourself a fun night out!
Location: Pasteur Street Craft Beer - Original Taproom

Review Title: Chanh Muoi Ale is the Best Beer I Have Ever Tasted!
Review Text: I really enjoyed this place. I am a lightweight and I am always looking for a beer with less alcohol and have the ability to order in a small glass instead of a pint or something huge and this place hit all of the dots. It also had probably the best tasting, very low alcohol beer I have ever had - chanh muoi ale (salted lime). Thinking about this place too much and will go back when I am in Saigon again! :)
Location: Pasteur Street Craft Beer - Original Taproom

Review Text:
If you enjoy craft beer and sitting in a cool modern bar- GO!!
Good selection of beers, you can get a beer paddle, 6 beers for under $20 AUD. Food was tasty and plentiful, we went buffalo wings and chicken sate.  Good music, good atmosphere. Thanks Ashley and Phuc for hosting!
Highly recommended!
Location: Pasteur Street Craft Beer - Original Taproom

Review Title: Este restaurante fue una agradable sorpresa.
Review Text: Es un sitio genial para una salida nocturna en pareja. Grato ambiente. Muy buena atención. Cervezas muy buenas, sobre todo la Session IPA y una Pale Ale que tienen. También tienen una tabla de quesos y charcutería bastante buena. Las personas que atienden son muy atentos. En general, buen sitio para pasar un rato con tu pareja.
Location: Pasteur Street Craft Beer - Original Taproom

Review Text: Great craft brewery, we did the tasting flight and all 6 beers were amazing. We had a great chat with our server Ryan and he gave us extra information about all of the beers as well as tips for the rest of our stay in HCMC. Highly recommended!
Location: Pasteur Street Craft Beer - Original Taproom

Review Text: Situated right on the busy streets of District 1 this place got some vibes for sure. Whether u sit indoors or outdoors by the street watching the passing crowd. The beers are fantastic and each one has distinct character. They have multiple options so that you can taste as many beers as you can! It’s just amazing!
Location: Pasteur Street Craft Beer - Original Taproom

Review Text: We got here a bit late and atmosphere wasn't great. beers are excellent and the building really is lovely, we were just there at the wrong time of the day ... will be back !

Review Text: Great food ~ Awesome service, very attentive and couldn't help us more than he did.  Beer was bloody good, nice music Food was fresh and tasty clean toilets

Review Title: Great beer. Great vibe. Great food.
Review Text: Several venues to choose from, all quite close. We enjoyed first visit so much that we went again. Lovely staff are pretty attentive and very friendly. Good choice if food (which was very nice - wings, burgers, pork belly bites) and beers (especially NEIPA). Would go again if tonight wasn't our last night.
Location: Pasteur Street Craft Beer - Original Taproom

Review Title: YOU HAVE TO VISIT THIS PLACE
Review Text: Absolutely loved this place, visited everyday of our stay in Saigon. Great beer choices, all the staff were so friendly and great music, what more could you want.  This is must do stop.  Thanks to all the team for looking after us.
Location: Pasteur Street Craft Beer - Original Taproom

Review Text: Excellent beer choices and wide variety. My husband and friends did the double Jasmine and I tried the Gods Water 😃. All great choices. We went twice and we had a chicken burger for lunch with fries. Great food and service.
Location: Pasteur Street Craft Beer - Original Taproom

Review Title: Nice experience craft Beer in Ho Chi Minh
Review Text: Good food , good beers, nice staff , like the jasmine IPA & Nashville hot chicken is perfect pairing - so tasty and  delicious
